description:
PLEASE RSVP USING THE LINK BELOW

https://gdg.community.dev/events/details/google-gdg-bristol-presents-devfest-uk-ireland-2021/

What is DevFest?

DevFest is one of the larger scale community-driven tech conferences in the UK & Ireland, carefully crafted for you by the Google Developer Group (GDG) community! GDG is a group of developers passionate about Google technologies with a strong focus on knowledge exchange and networking.

This year's DevFest UK & Ireland will be a hybrid one (in-person and virtual), with the in-person part being held at and hosted by King's College London.

Learn about Mobile, Web, Cloud, AI, Machine Learning, Hot Tech and more from world experts. We also have a track dedicated solely on Diversity, Equity & Inclusion.

**NOTE if attending in person:**

As this is a hybrid event, for anyone attending in person we have some requirements to ensure the safety of our attendees, speakers, sponsors, and volunteers.

To gain entry to the venue attendees will be required to show proof of vaccination or a negative lateral flow test taken within the last 48 hours. Also, everyone will be required to wear a mask (unless you have a proof of exemption) for the duration of the event when inside and not eating or drinking.

PLEASE RSVP USING THE LINK BELOW

https://gdg.community.dev/events/details/google-gdg-bristol-presents-devfest-uk-ireland-2021/

location.name: Bush House South East Wing, King's College London

title: DevFest UK & Ireland 2021
